metadata.name: HackTool - Hydra Password Bruteforce Execution
metadata.comment: Detects command line parameters used by Hydra password guessing hack tool

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-u ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-p ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('^user^')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('^pass^'))))

output.summary: Detects command line parameters used by Hydra password guessing hack tool

metadata.objective: False positive: Software that uses the caret encased keywords PASS and USER in its command line Reference: https://github.com/vanhauser-thc/thc-hydra
